title: left-facing fist: medium skin tone

nouns: The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.
Hand with the fingers curled into the palm
The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.
A fist is an action where a hand has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles.
A hand that has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles
Hand with the fingers clenched or curled inward
A hand with the fingers clenched in the palm (as for hitting)

description: This version of the  Left-facing Fist emoji has the  Medium Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Moderate Brown Skin Tone on suppo
apple_vendor_description: The left-facing fist emoji on Apple devices is rendered with a strong, solid form, featuring a medium skin tone and Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading that gives it a tactile, powerful appearance. Its smooth, rounded knuckles and subtle highlights convey a sense of solidarity, support, or a determined stance. This emoji is commonly used to express agreement, encouragement, or a united front in digital communication.
